    • effect

      public boolean effect(int islandRef)
      It checks if effect could be used, then use it. It puts a no entry tiles on an island.
      Overrides:
      effect in class RoundStrategy
      Parameters:
      islandRef - is the island's number.
      Returns:
      true if effect is used.

    • effect

      public void effect()
      It counts the number of island inhibited and compare it to the no entry number. If one no entry is missing, it increases the number of the tiles.
      Overrides:
      effect in class RoundStrategy
